column5: Wondering if there is any consistent salmon action on the north shore?

Ill let you know when i go out for round 2 on saturday. I went out last weekend and went 5/5 all little guys, didnt mark a good hook all day and only a handfull of small bait clouds. With the nicer weather im hoping the lake will setup nicely for the weekend and hopefully the fish will pile up a bit somewhere. Tightlines!

We fished Wellington from thursday till sunday. Caught about ten shakers and plenty of lakers. Also a 14 lbs chinook and got broke off on two screamers. Action should be good this weekend. Leader of the GOSD this week caught at the Bonnet! 27lbs
The kings are in the Oshawa & bommanville areas now !!! Reports are things are heating up pretty good fishing wise anyways some guys are I to them big time
